cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.8)
project(mdrem_algorithm)

if(CMAKE_COMPILER_IS_GNUCXX OR CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID MATCHES "Clang")
  add_compile_options(-Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic)
endif()

# find dependencies
find_package(ament_cmake REQUIRED)
find_package(rclcpp REQUIRED)
find_package(std_msgs REQUIRED)
find_package(sensor_msgs REQUIRED)
find_package(Eigen3 REQUIRED)

#set(EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR /usr/local/include/eigen3.4.0)

# Define the source files generated by MATLAB Coder
set(MATLAB_GENERATED_SRCS
  src/matlab_code/Observation_matrix_Franka.cpp
  src/matlab_code/Observation_matrix_Franka_initialize.cpp
  src/matlab_code/Observation_matrix_Franka_terminate.cpp
  src/matlab_code/inv.cpp
  # Add any other .cpp files generated by MATLAB Coder that are part of this unit
)

# Define the header directory for MATLAB generated code
# This is crucial so your main ROS nodes can #include "Observation_matrix_Franka.h"
# MATLAB_GENERATED_INCLUDE_DIR should point to the directory containing the .h files
set(MATLAB_GENERATED_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/matlab_code)

if(BUILD_TESTING)
  find_package(ament_lint_auto REQUIRED)
  # the following line skips the linter which checks for copyrights
  # comment the line when a copyright and license is added to all source files
  set(ament_cmake_copyright_FOUND TRUE)
  # the following line skips cpplint (only works in a git repo)
  # comment the line when this package is in a git repo and when
  # a copyright and license is added to all source files
  set(ament_cmake_cpplint_FOUND TRUE)
  ament_lint_auto_find_test_dependencies()
endif()


add_executable(mdrem_node src/mdrem_node.cpp
${MATLAB_GENERATED_SRCS})
ament_target_dependencies(mdrem_node rclcpp sensor_msgs std_msgs)

install(TARGETS
  mdrem_node
  DESTINATION lib/${PROJECT_NAME})

# Include the directory manually
# Note: For non-ROS dependencies like Eigen, you might need to add their includes explicitly
target_include_directories(mdrem_node PRIVATE
  ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR} SYSTEM # SYSTEM suppresses warnings from Eigen headers
  ${MATLAB_GENERATED_INCLUDE_DIR}
)

# Install the MATLAB generated header files (if other packages need to include them)
install(DIRECTORY src/matlab_code/
  DESTINATION include/${PROJECT_NAME}/matlab_code
  FILES_MATCHING PATTERN "*.h" PATTERN "*.hpp"
)

ament_package()
